column3: A delectable dessert that is one of Ravensborough's specialties. This is a close friend's favorite!
This dish has has a perfectly smooth texture. Some like it with gravy, others without.
A freeze-dried neapolitan dessert from the future. One could say it's out of this world!
The classic box recipe straight from the pot. Now this is comfort food at its best.
It has a smell that would only appeal to a cat. Pretend it's pâté in a last resort situation.
A sour blue gumdrop that revives a fallen hero. This restores their HP and the PP of all of their moves.
A spicy red gumdrop that restores the PP of all moves.
A sweet green gumdrop that restores the hero's HP.
A super-caffeinated purple beverage that restores the PP of one chosen move.
A super-caffeinated red beverage that restores the PP of one chosen move.
A super-caffeinated green beverage that restores the PP of one chosen move.
